main event: On July 14, 1955, an unidentified flying object was observed in the vicinity of La Habra, California. The object appeared to hover above the ground, moved back and forth for about two minutes, then suddenly accelerated and disappeared from sight. Several people reported seeing the object and detailed information was forwarded to Air Force Intelligence.
interesting points: Several people observed the object, adding credibility to the sighting.
The object appeared to hover and move back and forth before accelerating at high speed.
The report was forwarded to Air Force Intelligence for further investigation.
The report includes handwritten notes suggesting that the objects were probably high-flying jet aircraft, indicating the attempt to find a plausible explanation.
The sighting occurred at night, adding to the mystery and making it difficult to identify the object.
photographs: no photographs included in the report
